short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Discogs experience with a convenient Amazon search button on release pages for quick and easy searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your music collection journey with the Amazon QuickSearch extension for Discogs. This powerful tool integrates seamlessly, adding a convenient "Search on Amazon" button to every Discogs release page. Effortlessly find vinyl records, CDs, and other music releases on your preferred Amazon marketplace.

Features:
-Seamless Integration: Automatically adds an "Amazon search" button next to the "Shop now" link on Discogs release pages.
- Supports Multiple Marketplaces: Compatible with Amazon marketplaces including .com, .ca, .fr, .de, .it, .nl, .pl, .es, .se, and .co.uk.
- Easy Marketplace Selection: Use the simple popup interface to choose your preferred Amazon marketplace.
- Enhanced Search Efficiency: Quickly and conveniently find Discogs releases on Amazon, saving you time and effort.


Note: This extension uses Amazon affiliates referral links to help support and maintain the app. When you make purchases through these links, a small commission may be earned at no extra cost to you.
